name: Recogniform Form Designer File
summary: Learn about .RFD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Recogniform software is used for optical character recognition (OCR), bar code recognition (BCR), optical mark recognition (OMR), and other intelligent recognition techniques.

description: File created by Recogniform document recognition software; contains the page layout structure, text, and other formatting information; used for scanning and storing digital copies of paper forms.
